00027 #ifndef FILTER_EVAL_H_

00029

00031 #include "Model_Refiner.h"
00032 
00033 using namespace tbb;
00034 using namespace std;
00035 
00036 //!A filter in the TBB pipeline.
00037 /**
00038  * Delegates the task to be done to
00039  * refiner.eval. The output from the eval step is accumulated and
00040  * can be queried using get_eval()
00041  */
00042 class Filter_Eval: public filter {
00043 private:
00044     Model_Refiner& _refiner;
00045     double _value;
00046 
00047 public:
00048     Filter_Eval(Model_Refiner&);
00049     virtual ~Filter_Eval();
00050 
00051     void* operator()(void*);
00052     double get_eval();
00053 };
00054 
00055 #endif /* FILTER_EVAL_H_ */
